comments:
3.1 RC1

I migrated a plugin to 3.0. Then I created a manifest.mf file using the action
in the PDE editor. After that, the plugin.xml was empty. Thus, I decided to
remove it. I reopend the PDE editor via a double click on the manifest.mf file
and removed some Exported Packages (from the Runtime tab). Next, I clicked on a
jar file in the Classpath section on the same page. 

The following exception is thrown as soon as I click on any jar in this section.

Error 2005-06-08 16:06:30.808 Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in:
"org.eclipse.jface".
